abstract.p: Kiss Farewell Tour will include stop at Blockbuster Sony Entertainment Center in Camden, NJ; photo (S)

block.p: It might seem silly that four men in heavy theatrical makeup, old enough to cash in on their A.A.R.P. discounts, are running around a concert stage. In black leather tight enough to reveal paunches, they make sexual innuendo and indulge in campy pyrotechnics. This is the Kiss Farewell Tour, coming to the Blockbuster Sony Entertainment Center in Camden on Friday and the Continental Airlines Arena in East Rutherford on June 27.

Gene Simmons, Ace Frehley, Paul Stanley and Peter Criss are reclaiming their right as the kings of hook-laden heavy metal, and to croon such classics as ''Rock 'n' Roll All Night.'' Although their alternating farewells and reunions might get tiresome, they put on a full-throttle rock spectacular.
